bike.description: Specialized M4 fully manipulated alloy frame, fully butted, ORE DT, asymmetrical seat stays, forged dropouts w/ replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only

components.description: RockShox Recon SLite, 80/100mm, 1 piece magnesium lower, alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions, coil spring, preload and rebound adj. w/ LO
1-1/8" threadless, Campy style semi-cartridge bearings
3D forged alloy, reverse 4-bolt, 7 degree rise, 31.8mm clamp
Butted alloy riserbar, 25mm rise, 660mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 7 degree up sweep
Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
Avid Elixir 4 hydraulic disc, alloy backed organic pads, 160mm G3 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid Elixir 4 hydraulic disc, alloy backed organic pads, 160mm G3 Clean Sweep rotor
Avid Elixir 4
Shimano Deore, 34.9mm clamp, top swing, bottom pull
Shimano RD-M772 Deore XT Shadow, long cage
Shimano SL-M531 Deore trigger
Shimano HG50, 9-speed, 11-34t
KMC X9 w/ reuseable Missing Link
Shimano FC-M521, Hollowtech, Octalink spline
44A x 32S x 22S replaceable
Shimano BB-ES25, Octalink spline, cartridge bearing, 68mm x 118mm
Alloy body and cage, 9/16"
DT-Swiss 445D, 26", alloy double wall disc, pin joint, eyelets, 28h front and 32h rear
Forged alloy, hi/low flange, double sealed, ground race, machined disc mount, 28h
Forged alloy, double sealed, ground race, machined disc mount, cassette, 32h
2mm (14g) stainless
Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0", 60TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead
Specialized Fast Trak LK Control, 26x2.0", 60TPI, tubeless ready aramid bead
Schraeder valve
Specialized Rockhopper XC, Body Geometry, 143mm width, front and rear bumpers
Alloy two bolt, 12.5mm offset, micro adjust, 30.9mm
Forged alloy QR, brass washer
Chain stay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
